channel.title: Need Help Setting Up Server! Please Read For More!
channel.description: [b]Hey Guys, I'm in Need Of Help Setting Up a Server. i Can't find any good Sources and Stuff Needed. When i find 1 i set it all up and i can loggin but when someone else try's to loggin they loggin for 2 secs and get logged out and it continues to happen everytime they click. Someone Said it was a bad source or something. Can someone Help me Setup a server? i'll Give You Co-Owner and Everything Because Honestly I'd Love u so Much! Lol. I really Need Help Tho! i've Been Trying Forever So Please! Guys! Message Me Or Add me On Skype XxLeg1txx Thanks guys!:)[/b] [b]Please![/b]

item.title: Need Help Setting Up Server! Please Read For More!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

XxLeg1txX:

Hey Guys, I’m in Need Of Help Setting Up a Server. i Can’t find any good Sources and Stuff Needed. When i find 1 i set it all up and i can loggin but when someone else try’s to loggin they loggin for 2 secs and get logged out and it continues to happen everytime they click. Someone Said it was a bad source or something. Can someone Help me Setup a server? i’ll Give You Co-Owner and Everything Because Honestly I’d Love u so Much! Lol. I really Need Help Tho! i’ve Been Trying Forever So Please! Guys! Message Me Or Add me On Skype XxLeg1txx Thanks guys! Please!

Tell your friends not to install 32 bit Java on a 64 bit machine and vice versa.

item.title: Need Help Setting Up Server! Please Read For More!
item.dc:creator: @XxLeg1txX XxLeg1txX
item.description:
@XxLeg1txX wrote:

Okay and 1 More Thing. When i Change The Client.Java and Gui.java’s IP Do I Change It To My No-ip’s IP. Like Legendzscape.no-ip.biz?

Edit
I Did Ctrl F and Typed In 65 and I found It. Changed It to LegendzScape.no-ip.biz And Then I CLicked Next On That and There’s a Thing With The IP/Cache Do i Change The “IP” area To Legendzscape.no-ip.biz also? I’m Confused Lol. it says “return new URL(“http://You’re IP Is here/cache”);” Do i change that to mine where it says "Your IP is Here?

item.title: Need Help Setting Up Server! Please Read For More!
item.dc:creator: @megahost megahost
item.description:
@megahost wrote:

Change the ip client side only open up client.java and gui.java search for 65.75 that’s what my old ip started in change everything starting like that to your ip and here is a video on how to jar it and the program to jar your client

(Jar tut)


(Jarmaker)
http://www.downloadtyphoon.com/jar-maker/downloadbcupifvl
Also if you need anything else message back or pm me

Edit!
I Downloaded It and everything Can You Help Me Change The IP Through TeamViewer? Cause I can’t Find The Server’s IP At all. There’s Files Everywhere. Do I Change Server IP And Client? Or Just Server? Or what? i can’t find The Server IP.
